plot outline: Story revolves around Krishna (Arjun Mahi), who at an instance decides not to believe in long lasting relationships but he falls in love with Satya. Their relationship escalates and Satya proposes marriage to him and he rejects her proposal by expressing his feelings clearly. Satya finds out she is pregnant and Krishna gets a chance to fly abroad. It is now how their relationship ends.
title: Ishtangaa
plot: Story revolves around Krishna (Arjun Mahi), who at an instance decides not to believe in long lasting relationships but he falls in love with Satya. Their relationship escalates and Satya proposes marriage to him and he rejects her proposal by expressing his feelings clearly.
